column1: 2 ^ Quam dilécta tabernácula tua Dòmine virtútum. ^ How lovely are thy tabernacles

column2: et déficit ánima mea in átria Dòmini~; cor meum et carnis mea exsultavérunt in Deum vivum. ^ my soul longeth and fainteth for the courts of the Lord. My heart and my flesh have rejoiced in the living God.

column3: ubi ponat pullos suos~; altária tua
column6: et Deus meus. ^ For the sparrow hath found herself a house
column7: and the turtle a nest for herself where she may lay her young ones~; thy altars

column1: 5 ^ Beáti qŭi hábitant in domu tua
column2: Dòmine~; in sáĕcula saĕculórum laŭdábunt te. ^ Blessed are they that dwell in thy house
column3: O Lord~; they shall praise thee for ever and ever.

column1: 6 ^ Beátus vìr cujus est aŭxìlium a te~; ascensiónes in corde suo dispósuit
column2: ^ Blessed is the man whose help is from thee~; in his heart he hath disposed to ascend by steps
in loco qŭem pósuit. ^ In the vale of tears
column3: in the place which he hath set.

column1: 8 ^ Ètenim benedicțiónem dabit legislátor~; ibunt de virtúte in virtútem~; vǐdébitur Deus deórum in Sióne. ^ For the lawgiver shall give a blessing~; they shall go from virtue to virtue~; the God of gods shall be seen in Sion.

column3: Deus Jacóbis. ^ O Lord God of hosts

column4: et rèspice in fáciem christi tui. ^ Behold
column6: and look on the face of thy Christ.

column1: 11 ^ Qŭia mèlior est dies una in átriîs tuîs super mìllia~; elégi abjèctus esse in domu Dei mei magis qŭam habitáre in tabernáculîs peccatórum. ^ For better is one day in thy courts above thousands~; I have chosen to be an abject in the house of my God
column2: rather than to dwell in the tabernacles of sinners.

column1: 12 ^ Qŭia misericórdiam et veritátem díligit Deus~; gráțiam et glóriam dabit Dòminus. ^ For God loveth mercy and truth~; the Lord will give grace and glory.
13 ^ Non privábit bonîs eos qŭi ámbulant in innocènția~; Dòmine virtútum
column2: beátus hòmo qŭi sperat in te. ^ He will not deprive of good things them that walk in innocence~; O Lord of hosts
column3: blessed is the man that trusteth in thee.
